description_for_human: Interact with any blockchain through AI. 380+ tools for DeFi, trading, security analysis, and more across 20+ networks.
description_for_model: Agenti is a Universal Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI agents to interact with blockchain networks. It provides 380+ tools for blockchain operations (balances, transactions, contracts), DeFi (swaps, lending, staking), security analysis (honeypot detection, rug pull detection), market data, NFTs, and cross-chain bridges. Supports 20+ EVM networks including Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, BSC, and more. Includes x402 payment protocol for autonomous agent payments.
